11.title: Giant boy route (GT)

choices: Start with how Connor first grew
Start with Connor in the place where lives after his growth
111.content:
Name: Connor
Sex: Male
Age: 5
Height: 200 feet
Appearance: A cute young boy with medium-toned skin, black hair, and brown eyes. He wears a red t-shirt and blue jeans.
Personality: Connor is a sweet and playful 5-year-old boy, but he also likes to rampage occasionally.
Background: Connor used to be normal little boy, but one day he got doused with a serum his biochemist father was working on and grew to enormous size.
Where they live: New York City, USA
Type of story: Growth
111.title: Free slot 1

choices: Start with Sam helping out tinies
112.content:
Name: Sam, or Samzilla
Sex: Male
Age: 13
Height: 5' 10" (see below)
Appearance: A muscular teenager with spikey blond hair and blue eyes. Wears only a green speedo.
Personality: He loves acting dominant and showing off his size and power, but he's also caring enough to help out tiny people with his great strength.
Background: Sam used to be a small, skinny boy who got bullied a lot, but then he was subjected to an experiment that made him bigger and more muscular and gave him the ability to assume any size from his normal human height to 1000 feet tall.
Where they live: Malibu, California, USA
Type of story: Growth
112.title: Samzilla

choices: Start with the origins of Toshiozilla
113.content:
Name: Toshiozilla
Sex: Male
Age: 6
Height: 200ft
Appearance: A Japanese boy with a fair skin, short black hair, and green eyes. Just wears a green Speedo with a underwear underneath it.
Personality: He is a nice and caring boy, and is helpful, but totally acts like a giant monster every chance he can get, roaring, stomping, and acting dominant with his power. There is a reason he got his name Toshiozilla.
Background: Well he is a strange case. He was actually a military test experiment that was created when he was just a baby. His parents gave birth to him, and the military created some kaiju DNA and infused it to him. He started growing massively over the years, and even gained powers like atomic breath, monster roars, breathing underwater, and regeneration. He was though beloved by Japan, and is actually why he has the name Toshiozilla.
Where he lives: Tokyo, Japan
Type of story: Growth
113.title: Toshiozilla

choices: Super puberty had a big impact on him already.
114.content:
Name: Scott Rioux
Sex: Man
Age: 14
Height: 6'1
Appearance: Tall, skinny and geek. He has long light brown hair and green eyes. He usually wears a white shirt and blue jeans.
Personality: Quiet and withdrawn. He spends most of his time in his room. He chats with many people on the internet about scientific things. Personally, he is only with his two childhood friends. His family and friends are very important to him. However, he does not like to interfere in the affairs of others. He loves to solve mysteries and riddles.
Background: Member of an upper middle class family. He has 3 siblings.
Type of story: Growth. He got super growth during puberty. His body is constantly growing. It is his intention to figure out the reason for his growth.

choices: Start with him rampaging a fake city
Start with him rampaging a real city
Start with him playing with his small family

122.content:
Name: Haruhi-zilla
Sex: Female
Age: 10
Height: 900 feet
Appearance: A very cute girl with long pink hair and blue eyes. She wears a bright yellow bikini.
Personality: She loves rampaging playfully, but she also likes being gentle with tinies.
Background: Haruhi grew into a giantess with immense powers when she accidentally merged with a huge crystal meteorite. In addition to her size, she can control any type of energy, which she uses to fire atomic breath from her mouth or lightning blasts from her hands or make powerful roars. She also has the power to undo all the damage from her rampages, since she's not a mean giantess.
Where they live: Tokyo, Japan, but she travels all over the world in her playing.
Type of story: Growth
122.title: Queen of the Monster Kids

choices: She plays with the tiny people
She leaves and heads back to her island
1222.content:
Right now we see Haruhizilla rampaging a city in Japan, with people running away from the giant kid, who was smiling at the destruction that she was causing. She was using her fire breath that she has to roast up several buildings in complete flames with a smile, and even used her cute little body to crush several more buildings in the process. “This is so much fun, and the best part is... thanks to my powers, I can turn back time how many times I want to undo all the damage.” She smiled just as she focuses her energy, and then suddenly time starts to fly backwards, reversing all the damage that she has caused. Buildings unexplode, they get un crushed, people run in reverse, etc, etc etc.

Haruhizilla smiled just as she used her power to reverse time right up to the point to where she was arising from the ocean. It would be hard for her to move around the city and such, given she is almost 1000ft tall, but that is why she has her time using powers for a good back up as needed. So, what does she do now?
1222.title: Show her rampaging in a city

Name: Kana, or Kanazilla
Sex: Female
Age: 6
Height: 600 feet
Appearance: A young Japanese girl with pink hair and big blue eyes. She wears a pink one-piece swimsuit
Personality: She is very sweet and uses her size and power to help out little people, but she also loves rampaging in virtual cities.
Background: Kana was transformed into a kaiju girl by a mysterious artifact found beneath a shrine where her big sister works as a priestess. In addition to her size, she can breathe underwater, control plants and animals, or fire a powerful pink energy beam from her mouth.
Where they live: Kyoto, Japan
Type of story: Growth
1251.title: Kana the cute kaiju

choices: Start with her wrecking and rebuilding a city

Start with her building stuff in the countryside.
1252.content:
Name: Jade
Sex: Female
Age: 3
Height: 400 feet
Appearance: A pretty girl with curly brown hair, and bright green eyes, and light tan skin. She wears a beautiful green dress.
Personality: She's a very sweet and playful young girl with an vivid imagination.
Powers: She can make giant green crystals grow out of the ground and make almost anything she imagines out of this substance, from buildings to machines and sometimes even creatures. She can also shoot powerful green lasers from her eyes or hands. Her best power is that her mind became a bit more mature, she can talk like a 7 or 8 year old, and she understands buildings and machines better than almost adult, though she still has the innocence of a 3-year-old.
Background: While Jade was on a camping trip with her family, she wandered into the woods, and a mysterious, glowing green spirit appeared and merged with her. This turned her into the powerful giantess she is today, and her parents were speechless. Sometimes, the government will let her destroy part of a city and rebuild it with her wondrous green crystal structures.
Where they live: Hampshire, England.
Type of story: Growth

152.content:
Name: Molly Cunningham
Sex: Female
Age: 5-6

Appearance:
Molly is a young bear cub-ette
https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Molly_Cun...

Personality:
Sweet, tough, fearless, adventurous, energetic,
cute, happy, brave, curious, kind and gentle



Type of story: Growth

background: Molly is the young daughter of
Rebecca Cunningham.
She’s adventurous and curious.

In one instance she felt ignored and useless
so she wandered to a nearby home
belonging to a crazy scientist.
Once there she bumped a device the
the scientist had made TO SHRINK ONLY
and was never intended to restore things to
normal!

She had shrunken and hijinx happened
Eventually her family got shrunk to help her
but the scientist managed to improvise an
enlarging function that wasn’t unstable and
Imperfect and fix them all.


Now what if sometime later
( weeks or months )
Molly wonders in again forgetting or not
understanding what the scientist did to
the device and expecting another
shrunken adventure but instead her
“Little” adventure quite literally turns into
a BIG adventure instead?
152.title: Free slot 2

info.brief_description: You are a kid (male or female) who is much bigger than anyone else. (GT/GTS mainly and BW)
info.description:
https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2105949-Bigger-Is-Always-... (Using this story as an inspiration so make sure to check it out)

Disclaimer here. This story is only mention to be for entertainment and to only be treated as such, so don’t take anything here too seriously. I have had people come and tell me that on this type of stuff, so I do encourage y’all not to be those types of people. Yes they are kids in this story, but don’t think that this is a pedophile story. I am only making this interactive for entertainment, nothing else.

Here the premise is simple. You are a young kid from age 6 months-17 who is living life like normal, but there is one thing that makes them different... they are giant. No matter what size they are, amazon, kaiju, or galaxy size, they are just trying to live life. Or hell if they have grown big somehow, etc... make they rampage and destroy the city. Maybe they become a hero, but here mainly they are giant kids.

Yes I know I have made similar stories but here this is my first story to allow male giants. Plus it follows a structure similar to the story I linked above, and I hope you check out my other stories. Mainly Tiny Prison and Goddess for sure.

Time for rules

No Scat
No Heavy Sexual Activity
No nudity, a underwear and swimsuit (for girls) is at least required
No giants older than 17
The main character you make cannot die
Shrinking is allowed as long it’s not the main character
Furries are allowed in its own route
They can be giant already or you can do a slowly growth story
Follow the character format provided in the next page closely
Vore is acceptable

Remember to add to these stories as well.

Girlzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226717-Girlzilla-Giantes...

Tiny Prison: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2225005-The-Tiny-Prison-a...

Goddess Ruler: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2224922-Goddess-Ruler-A-G...

Gigantic Lolis: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2222635-Gigantic-Lolis-a-...

The Daibijin Interactive: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219621-The-Daibijin-Inte...

Child/Preteen Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219542-ChildPreteen-Gian...

Chantal: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1881854-Chantal-The-Drago...

A Typical Life of a Kaiju Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1845671-ATypical-Life-as-...
